long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Popup that appears on screen every 20 minutes to remind you to look away from your screen and relax your eyes.

 This extension uses the "20-20-20" rule - look 20 feet away for 20 seconds every 20 minutes. Studies show that staring at a screen for prolonged periods of time can cause myopia (nearsightedness) or worsen existing myopia. This extension will remind you to take a break.
